sentences.en: CASEY: Without your little exorcism book? Hey, go ahead.
sentences.cn: 不用你的小趋魔书? 呵, 你尽管试试看.

sentences.en: Exorcism - 0.81 threat per hit ( 0.05 threat per second )
sentences.cn: 驱邪 -0.81 仇恨每击 ( 0.05仇恨每秒 )

sentences.en: Exorcism can now be cast on any target.
sentences.cn: 驱邪可以作用在任何目标上.

sentences.en: Exorcism mana cost reduced and now scales with attack power and spell power.
sentences.cn: 驱邪术的法力消耗减少,现在同时受AP、SP影响.

sentences.en: Improved movement speed of the ghosts on Exorcism a bit.
sentences.cn: 增加了DP大招的鬼魂的移动速度.

sentences.en: Master Bao places the exorcism cloth onto the infected area.
sentences.cn: 包师父用工具抹着撒死尸水的地方.

sentences.en: The atmosphere of the familiar room is completely changed by his stated purpose of exorcism.
sentences.cn: 这熟悉的房间的气氛被他既定的驱邪目的彻底改变了.

sentences.en: The excess that they encountered during the exorcism was so excessive.
sentences.cn: 驱魔期间他们遇到了过多的过度行为.

sentences.en: The exorcism was broadcast on television.
sentences.cn: 电视上播放了驱邪仪式。

sentences.en: Undid previous damage return threshold change on Exorcism.
sentences.cn: 取消了上次对DP大招的改动.

sentences.en: What an excellent day for an exorcism.
sentences.cn: 真是做法驱魔的好日子.

sentences.en: You don't believe in the exorcism of demons, do you?
sentences.cn: 你还相信打鬼这样的迷信啊?

trans.tran_cn: （以祈祷或符咒）驱邪，用魔法召鬼魂
trans.tran_en: a process during which someone tries to make an evil spirit leave a place by saying special words, or a ceremony when this is done
